Label: GV
Description: Government office, ministry, and department (incl. local authorities)

Label: IN
Description: International organization concerned with economic development

Label: RO
Description: Organization whose membership consists of several countries within a geographical region

Label: IO
Description: Organization whose membership consists of several countries within and outside a region and not engaged in research

Label: FI
Description: Institution collecting funds from the public and placing them in financial assets, such as banks, trust funds

Label: FD
Description: Non-governmental organizations established as nonprofit corporations or as charitable trusts, with the principal purpose of making grants to unrelated organizations, institutions, or individuals for scientific, educational, cultural, religious, or other charitable purposes.
